content: free sample pattern the forever hug collection the forever hug heart is a small meaningful crochet accessory designed to compliment the forever hug bear or to be made on its own as a thought handmade gift this pattern is also perfect for using up scrap yarn the heart is worked in continuous rounds using basic amigurumi techniques instructions include notes for splitting the round and rejoining yarn to create the heart shaping cleanly and securely finished size approx 2 5 3 inches tall when made with worsted weight yarn and a 4 mm hook size may vary depending on yarn choice and gauge materials this heart is a small scrap-friendly project and works well with leftover worsted weight yarn small amount approx 15 20 yards -4 mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain tight stitches -fiberfill stuffing small amount -yarn needle -stitch marker recommended gauge gauge is not critical for this pattern but tight even stitches are recommended to prevent stuffing from showing this pattern is suitable for confident beginners and beyond familiarity with working in the round and basic increases and decreases is recommended
